whatToExpect.title: What to Expect?
whatToExpect.paragraph1: When you visit St. John's Presbyterian Church, you'll be welcomed into a friendly, casual environment where you can come as you are.
whatToExpect.paragraph2: Our services typically last about 1 hour and include:

list.item1: Engaging worship music that blends contemporary and traditional styles
list.item2: Practical, Bible-based teaching that applies to everyday life
list.item4: Programs for children and youth during service times

whatToExpect.paragraph3: Whether you're exploring faith for the first time or have been a Christian for years, we have a place for you.

latestSermons.title: Latest Sermons
latestSermons.subtitle: Missed a service? Watch or listen to our recent messages

specialServices.title: Special Services
specialServices.subtitle: In addition to our regular services, we offer special gatherings throughout the year

service1.title: Holiday Services
service1.description: Special services for Easter, Christmas, and other significant holidays. These services often include special music, drama, and meaningful traditions.

service2.title: Baptism Services
service2.description: Quarterly baptism services where new believers publicly declare their faith. These joyful celebrations are open to all who wish to witness this important step.

service3.title: Communion Services
service3.description: Monthly communion services where we remember Christ's sacrifice. These reflective services include worship, scripture reading, and partaking in the Lord's Supper.

service4.title: Prayer & Healing Services
service4.description: Special services dedicated to prayer for healing and spiritual renewal. These intimate gatherings provide space for extended prayer and ministry.
